products.title: Splash Frost Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Frost Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £7.96 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Frost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour.  It will freshen up any space within the home or office.  Splash Frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

products.metadescription: Splash Paper White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Our Splash Paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind in White. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow vertical blinds provide a beautiful and fresh finish when dressing windows.  It is an attractive bright white colour.  The Splash Snow fabric is also moisture resistent making them perfect for kitchens and bathrooms.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window.  As this is one of our made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Paper White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Paper White 89mm Vertical Blind in White. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, our Splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds.  Splash Paper White is a chic medium brown vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this white vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1329 Fabric Colour: Paper Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Clear Tilt Wand or Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Splash Snow White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room.  Splash Snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens or high traffic areas. Panel blinds are our best choice for big windows and our go-to recommendation for french windows and patio doors.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0263 Fabric Colour: Snow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Paper White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Paper White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Paper White Panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This off-white dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This white panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0280 Fabric Colour: Paper Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Frost White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Frost White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This White panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and white fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. 
 
One of the largest blinds we make, our panel blinds stretch to a massive five metres width and three and a half metres drop.  This makes panel blinds perfect for covering large windows that stretch the property, or conservatory windows and patio doors.  Another great alternative, is to use panel blinds as room divider, a unique and stylish way to divide space.  
 
Our panel blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0242 Fabric Colour: Frost Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Snow White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room.  Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  Splash Snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
